eminstall.config.actions.title=Actions eminstall.config.edit=Edit configuration eminstall.config.install=Start install (Attention: will actually do a lot of work, NOT REVERSIBLE) eminstall.config.viewstatus=View status eminstall.config.adddecision=Add a new page decision (save before !!!) eminstall.config.deletedecision=Delete (save before !!!) eminstall.config.backtoconfig=Go back to configuration

Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_wikis=Wikis to perform install on Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_toRepairExtId=Extension to repair (id) Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_toRepairExtVersion=Extension to repair (version) Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_toInstallExtId=Extension to install (id) Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_toInstallExtVersion=Extension to install (version) Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_installWithCurrentUser=Install extension with current user as author Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_spacesToKeep=Prevent the following spaces from being deleted by EM (separated by comma) Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_defaultDeleteDecision=Otherwise do the following action for pages that EM proposes to delete Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_defaultConflictDecision=Default decision for conflicts on pages that do not appear in the list under Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_tryToFinishDW=Try to finalize the DW if any is found running on the wiki
Admin.EMInstallConfigClass_page=Page Admin.EMInstallConfigDecisionsClass_decision=Decision Admin.EMInstallConfigDecisionsClass_decision_NEXT=Install new version (NEXT) Admin.EMInstallConfigDecisionsClass_decision_CURRENT=Keep current version (CURRENT) Admin.EMInstallConfigDecisionsClass_decision_MERGED=Merge the 2 pages (MERGED)
